title: Front Sprocket Cover - Inspection

body.body: If the rear wheel is rotated, fingers, hands or loose clothing could become trapped as the drive chain rotates on the sprockets, and cause a crushing injury to the fingers, hands or other parts of your body.
To prevent injury, never place fingers, hands or loose clothing near the drive chain or sprockets.
Inspect the rubber grommets, flanged sleeves and rubber buffer for damage or wear.
